entry.title: Summer Vacation
entry.content: Because of COVID-19. The beginning of summer vacation in Taiwan changes from 7/1 to 5/12. It sounds great to students. But it is terrible news to many parents. To me, itâ€™s time for me to learn more about programing techniques and practice them.
